Articles.Content:
There are some mods/online tools  that calculate the amount of EC needed for dark side transit or night period, but most often they don't have support for an specific mod and/or don't calculate what I want or with the parameters I want. It also calculates the amount of EC needed to transmit data from the the biggest experiment and all of them.

So I made the Google Sheet to fulfill theses needs of mine.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DuE2kp_rWpFHqAgG1p6J2xSFLOQkNpBFSQEdHb_-LoI/edit?usp=sharing

For now it supports (some not fully yet):

-BoxSat
-DMagic Orbital Science
-KW Rocketry
-Near Future Electrical
-Near Future Solar
-OPM
-SCANSat
-Sounding Rockets
-Surface Experiments Pack
-USI-LS
-USI-MKS


There are plans to add more mod support

Although this is not the most complex thing, there might be some errors, feedback and suggestion are all welcome!

 

 

Edited April 3, 2018 by VaPaL

I just implemented support for elliptic orbits (on the WIP sheet). For what I see everything is working fine, but some feedback would be appreciated.

Also, some feedback on this sheet would also be fine. Do you found easy to read and understand the sheet?

very helpful and 

Quote

 easy to read and understand


Does stats change since 1.2?
I haven't checked, I still playing 1.2.2, but I'll upgrade soon. But if you find any, just let me know and I'll fix it
